name: Lv30 Autumn Chest
description: Autumn Test Limited Growth Chest (available for use at Lv.30), which contains Zeny x5000, Skill Reset Rod x1, Eternal Rock x1, Lightning Chain x1, Leaf of Yggdrasil x2, Blue Potion x20, Belief Token x5, Lv.30 Job Weapon x1.

name: Lv99 Growth Pack
description: Growth Pack limited to Novice (you can use after reaching Lv99). Open it and you will get Zeny x 100000, Random Collection-Blue Card x 1, Yggdrasil Berry x 20, Mithril Stone x 10, Random Dead Branch (MVP) x 1 and Random Dead Branch (MINI) x 5.

name: Mace
description: A mace with a chain atop.

name: Mace of Judgment [1]
description: It has a Maces force against devil. I guess even Morroc can not take it.
effect: INT ＋6,＋20% [Adoramus] multiplier for each refining level gained after reaching refining ＋5 (up to 200%)

description: It has a Maces force against devil. I guess even Morroc can not take it.

name: Mad Hat
description: The girl jumped into the hole with the rabbit, and met an important person. The gentleman gracefully saluted the girl.
